neopets, toontown or on her PS2.>>>

Toontown! Cool. We play. Let me know if she wants a secret friend or two. I could put her on my friends list or my daughter's (age 11).

~Jill

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: PS2 & missing kid
messages.msgSnippet: We have been deschooling our dtr (11 yo)since Spring and I was missing out until I decided to be a part of her world.  She was always on neopets, toontown or
messages.messageBody:
We have been deschooling our dtr (11 yo)since Spring and I was missing
out until I decided to be a part of her world. She was always on
neopets, toontown or on her PS2. I'm very much a novice at the games
but who cares, she actually thinks its funny to watch me play her
games.

Also, the time on the games has dramatically dropped over the past
couple of weeks. We have been doing more crafts, watching movies and
talking more.

For me I just keep reading everything I can get my hands on about
unschooling and read the posts on this site. I know it works and my
dtr will be far better in the long run.

Play on!
Kay
